items.sentence: Tom opened his suitcase and began unpacking.

I promised myself I wouldn\'t do this again.

Everyone can make a difference in the world.

Why haven\'t we heard about this before now?

I don\'t know why I didn\'t try this before.

Philosophy is an interesting field of study.
